title: Premium Shopping Cart Interface
description: A visually stunning, premium shopping cart interface with a monochrome blue gradient theme, mesh gradient overlay, and advanced visual effects.

generation_hints.image_optimization: Use next/image for product images with proper sizing and lazy loading
generation_hints.cart_logic: Implement real-time price calculation with useEffect dependency on products
generation_hints.gradient_effects: Apply blue gradient mesh overlay throughout the interface
generation_hints.loading_state: Show skeleton loaders with gradient animation during data fetch
generation_hints.empty_state: Display shopping cart icon with helpful message when cart is empty
generation_hints.fixed_footer: Keep checkout footer fixed at bottom with backdrop blur effect
